name: Welcome to Bubble Tea !
description:
Welcome to Bubble Tea is a coffee management game with visual novel parts where you play as Mitsuri, the part-timer. 

Created as an end-year project (2021), 8 students, 2 months.

Everything could have gone very smoothly if it weren't for her boss... Who happens to be a Yakuza!
Follow Mitsuri's story with her non-conventional colleagues and learn about the characters, their relationships and the world of yakuzas...

The game is available in french and english ! (as we are not native english speakers, we would love to have some feedbacks, don't hesitate to leave a comment if you see a mistake somewhere.)

Controls : 

Left click : interact/select

Right click : close window/speed text

Spacebar: speed text
